Verses: 1 penyameen Koththiraththaaril Kees Ennum Perulla Makaa Paraakkiramasaaliyaana Oru Manushan Irundhaan; Avan Penyameen Koththiraththaanaakiya Apiyaavin Makanaana Pekoraaththirkup Pirandha Serorin Puththiranaakiya Apeeyelin Kumaaran.

2 avanukkuch Chavul Ennum Perulla Savundhariyamaana Vaalipanaakiya Oru Kumaaran Irundhaan; Isravel Puththiraril Avanaippaarkkilum Savundhariyavaan Illai; Ellaa Janangalum Avan Tholukkuk Keezhaayirukkaththakka Uyaramullavanaayirundhaan.

3 savulin Thakappanaakiya Keesutaiya Kazhudhaikal Kaanaamarpoyitru; Aakaiyaal Kees Than Kumaaranaakiya Savulai Nokki: Nee Velaikkaararil Oruvanaik Koottikkontu, Kazhudhaikalaith Theta, Purappattuppo Endraan.

4 appatiye Avan Eppiraayeem Malaikalaiyum Saleeshaa Naattaiyum Katandhuponaan; Ange Avaikalaik Kaanaamal Saaleem Naattaikkatandhaarkal. Angeyum Kaanavillai, Penyameen Naattai Uruvakkatandhum Avaikalaik Kaanavillai.

5 avarkal Soop Ennum Naattirku Vandhapodhu, Savul Thannotirundha Velaikkaaranai Nokki: En Thakappan, Kazhudhaikalin Melulla Kavalaiyaivittu, Namakkaakak Kavalaippataadhapatikkuth Thirumpippovom Vaa Endraan.

6 adharku Avan: Idho, Indhap Pattanaththile Thevanutaiya Manushan Oruvar Irukkiraar; Avar Periyavar; Avar Sollukiradhellaam Thappaamal Natakkum; Ange Povom; Oru Velai Avar Naam Pokaventiya Nammutaiya Vazhiyai Namakkuth Therivippaar Endraan.

7 appozhudhu Savul Than Velaikkaaranaip Paarththu: Naam Ponaalum Andha Manushanukku Ennaththaik Kontupovom; Nammutaiya Paikalil Irundha Thinpantangal Selavazhindhupoyitru; Thevanutaiya Manushanaakiya Avarukkuk Kontu Pokaththakka Kaanikkai Nammitaththil Ondrum Illaiye Endraan.

8 andha Velaikkaaran Pinnum Savulaip Paarththu: Idho, En Kaiyil Innum Kaalsekkal Velliyirukkiradhu; Thevanutaiya Manushan Namakku Nammutaiya Vazhiyai Arivikkumpatikku, Adhai Avarukkuk Kotuppen Endraan.

9 murkaalaththil Isravelil Yaadhoruvar Thevanitaththil Visaarikkapponaal, Gnaanadhirushtikkaaranitaththirkup Povom Vaarungal Enpaarkal; Innaalile Theerkkadharisi Ennappatukiravan Murkaalaththil Gnaanadhirushtikkaaran Ennappatuvaan.
10 appozhudhu Savul Than Velaikkaaranai Nokki: Nallakaariyam Sonnaai, Povom Vaa Endraan; Appatiye Thevanutaiya Manushan Irundha Andhap Pattanaththirkup Ponaarkal.
11 avarkal Pattanaththu Mettin Vazhiyaai Erukirapodhu, Thanneer Etukkavandha Penkalaik Kantu: Gnaanadhirushtikkaaran Inge Irukkiraaraa Endru Avarkalaik Kettaarkal.
12 adharku Avarkal: Irukkiraar; Idho, Ungalukku Edhire Irukkiraar; Theeviramaaip Pongal; Indraikku Janangal Metaiyil Paliyitukirapatiyinaal, Indraiyadhinam Pattanaththirku Vandhaar.

13 neengal Pattanaththirkul Piravesiththavutane, Avar Metaiyinmel Pojanam Pannappokiradharku Munne Avaraik Kaanpeerkal; Avar Varumattum Janangal Pojanam Pannamaattaarkal; Paliyittadhai Avar Aaseervadhippaar; Pinpu Azhaikkappattavarkal Pojanam Pannuvaarkal; Utane Pongal; Inneraththile Avaraik Kantukollalaam Endraarkal.
14 avarkal Pattanaththirkup Poi, Pattanaththin Natuve Serndhapodhu, Idho, Saamuvel Metaiyin Mel Erippokiradharkaaka, Avarkalukku Edhire Purappattuvandhaan.
15 savul Vara Oru Naalukku Munne Karththar Saamuvelin Kaadhuketka:

16 naalai Inneraththirkup Penyameen Naattaanaakiya Oru Manushanai Unnitaththil Anuppuven; Avanai En Janamaakiya Isravelinmel Adhipadhiyaaka Apishekam Pannakkatavaai; Avan En Janaththaip Pelisdharin Kaikku Neengalaakki Ratchippaan; En Janaththin Muraiyitudhal Ennitaththil Vandhu Ettinapatiyinaal, Naan Avarkalaik Kataatchiththen Endru Velippatuththiyirundhaar.
17 saamuvel Savulaik Kanta Podhu, Karththar Avanitaththil: Idho, Naan Unakkuch Cholliyirundha Manushan Ivane; Ivan Thaan En Janaththai Aaluvaan Endraar.
18 savul Natuvaasalile Saamuvelitaththil Vandhu: Gnaanadhirushtikkaaran Veetu Enge, Sollum Endru Kettaan.

19 saamuvel Savulukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Gnaanadhirushtikkaaran Naan Thaan; Nee Enakku Munne Metaiyinmel Erippo; Neengal Indraikku Ennote Pojanampannaventum; Naalaikkaalame Naan Un Irudhayaththil Ulladhu Ellaavatraiyum Unakku Ariviththu, Unnai Anuppivituven.

20 moondru Naalaikku Munne Kaanaamarpona Kazhudhaikalaip Patrik Kavalaippataventaam; Avaikal Akappattadhu; Idhallaamal Sakala Isravelin Apetchaiyum Yaarai Naatukiradhu? Unnaiyum Un Veettaar Anaivaraiyum Allavaa? Endraan.

21 appozhudhu Savul Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Naan Isravel Koththirangalile Siridhaana Penyameen Koththiraththaan Allavaa? Penyameen Koththiraththuk Kutumpangalilellaam En Kutumpam Arpamaanadhu Allavaa? Neer Ippatippatta Vaarththaiyai Ennitaththil Solvaanen Endraan.

22 saamuvel Savulaiyum Avan Velaikkaaranaiyum Pojanasaalaikkul Azhaiththukkontupoi, Avarkalai Azhaikkappattavarkalukkulle Thalaimaiyaana Itaththile Vaiththaan; Azhaikkappattavarkal Erakkuraiya Muppadhuperaayirundhaarkal.
23 pinpu Saamuvel Samaiyarkaaranaip Paarththu: Naan Un Kaiyile Oru Pangaik Kotuththuvaiththene, Adhaik Kontuvandhu Vai Endraan.

24 appozhudhu Samaiyarkaaran, Oru Munnandhotaiyaiyum, Adhanotirundhadhaiyum Etuththukkontuvandhu, Adhai Savulukkumun Vaiththaan; Appozhudhu Saamuvel: Idho, Idhu Unakkendru Vaikkappattadhu, Idhai Unakku Munpaaka Vaiththuch Chaappitu; Naan Janangalai Virundhukku Azhaiththadhumudhal, Idhuvaraikkum Idhu Unakkaaka Vaikkappattirundhadhu Endraan; Appatiye Savul Andraiyadhinam Saamuvelote Saappittaan.
25 avarkal Metaiyilirundhu Pattanaththirku Irangivandhapinpu, Avan Melveettile Savulote Pesikkontirundhaan.

26 avarkal Adhikaalame Kizhakku Velukkira Neraththil Ezhundhirundhapodhu, Saamuvel Savulai Melveettin Mel Azhaiththu: Naan Unnai Anuppivitumpatikku Aayaththappatu Endraan; Savul Aayaththappattapodhu, Avanum Saamuvelum Iruvarumaaka Veliye Purappattaarkal.

27 avarkal Pattanaththin Kataisi Mattum Irangi Vandha Podhu, Saamuvel Savulaip Paarththu: Velaikkaaranai Namakku Munne Natandhupokach Chol Endraan; Appatiye Avan Natandhu Ponaan; Ippozhudhu Naan Thevanutaiya Vaarththaiyai Unakkuth Therivikkumpatikku, Nee Satre Thariththunil Endraan.
